content: I wouldn't be opposed to cranking SSTORE costs up significantly, as well as contract creations.  Until we have regenesis we should probably also increase the cost per byte of transaction data as well.

content: Why would they need to? How is this much different from e.g. some buggy client not enforcing the code size limit, deploying larger contract and forking off, then someone snap-syncing into that chain. And nobody checks the size of all deployed contracts during sync.
